name: City Mafia War: Fighting Shoot
description:
City Mafia War: Fighting Shooter is a best Crime simulator game among all shooting games & gangster games of theft auto gangsters. Show your skills by fighting in open world real action game. Be a real grand theft and steel all you can. Take the most extreme arsenal and defeat the criminal underworld
Features:

High-quality realistic graphics and special effects.
3D cityscape environments and multi-level quest!
Action music and control sounds.
Smooth and easy controls.
